author: hthomann
msg: OPENJPA-1691: reverting previous (inadvertent) changes to pom.xml!!

author: markt
msg: r1144391 switched the key for the processor map for this connector from the socket to the socket wrapper. That prevented Comet from being able to retrieve the processor from the map when processing a comet event.
This commit changes all the connectors to map the socket (or rather whatever the SocketWrapper wraps) to the processor rather than the SocketWrapper.

author: hthomann
msg: OPENJPA-1691: Oracle XMLType column failed to insert/update when xml contains more than 4000 characters - applied Jeremy's 2.0.x patch and in addition I added documentation.
